commands.name: sobject describe
commands.description: Display the metadata for a standard or custom object or a Tooling API object.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the `target-org` configuration variable is already set.

requiredFlags.name: --sobject
requiredFlags.description: API name of the object to describe.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

optionalFlags.name: --use-tooling-api
optionalFlags.description: Use Tooling API to display metadata for Tooling API objects.

commands.name: sobject list
commands.description: List all Salesforce objects of a specified category.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the `target-org` configuration variable is already set.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.
